rukus.text: 79|27|changjoga deo eolyeoun geos-eun geudaedeul-inga animyeon haneul-inga? geubunkkeseo geugeos(haneul)eul jieusyeossnola
79|28|geubunkkeseoneun geugeos(haneul)ui kkogdaegileul ollisyeossgo geu hu geugeos-eul gyundeunghage dusyeoss-eumyeo
79|29|geugeos-ui bam-eul eodubge hasyeossgo geugeos-ui achimbich-eul naesyeossnola
79|39|sillo taoleuneun buljiog, geugos-i geojujiga doel geos-ila
79|40|geuleona jasin-ui junim ap-e seoneun il-eul dulyeowohamyeo jasin-ui yogguleul jeoljehadeon janeun
79|42|geudeul-i geudae(muhammadeu)ege jongmal-ui sigan-e gwanhae mul-euni “geugeos-eun eonje gaesidoendan mal-inga?”
79|43|geugeos(gaesi sigan)ui eongeub-e gwanhayeo geudaega eotteon gwanlyeon-i issdan mal-inga
79|45|geudaeneun ojig geugeos(jongmal-ui sigan)eul dulyeowohaneun jaleul wihan gyeong-gojail ppun-ila
79|46|geugeos(jongmal-ui sigan)eul boneun nal geudeul-eun machi (hyeonseeseo) ohuna achimnajeolman-eul meomulleossda saeng-gaghal geos-ila
